pages.text:
about GDT
meet josh & rosie
Garden District Taproom is West Palm Beach's first self-pour taproom. With 25 taps, featuring a wide variety of craft beer, wine, seltzer, kombucha & more, we are truly an adult candy store. Sit back and relax in the beautiful taproom, chill in our upstairs lounge, or stay and play a while out on the shady (pup friendly) patio.â€‹
GDT was established by Josh and Rosie Hanson, who have a fondness for both craft beer and the beautiful city of West Palm Beach. Feeling like downtown was missing something, they set out to create a spot with a fun aesthetic, a killer beer selection, and a chill vibe.
â€‹
Come pour, sip, repeat with us!

Test your knowledge as you compete for top prizes and bragging rights with a fun filled night of beer and Trivia at Garden District Taproom.
Grab your besties and head to Garden District Taproom for TRIVIA NIGHT! Put your knowledge to the test, drink some beer & have tons of fun!
Prizes for the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd place teams. The fun starts @ 7 pm every Thursday. See you there!
